keywords.value: The Mockingbird Next Door: Life With Harper Lee (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: “Mockingbird: A Portrait of Harper Lee,” due Tuesday, paints a more nuanced and in some ways perplexing portrait of Ms. Lee than a biography of 2006.

headline.main: Harper Lee Biographer Charles Shields on His Latest Edition

snippet: “Mockingbird: A Portrait of Harper Lee,” due Tuesday, paints a more nuanced and in some ways perplexing portrait of Ms. Lee than a biography of 2006.
